title: Rune Pages? Where Did They Go?
body: Could be bug or simply I haven't looked hard enough but I can't seem to access in the shop the place to buy rune pages I went to the shop under "GAMEPLAY" and to my surprise there was no place to buy the rune page at the top or even when I scrolled down please help {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
The sorting parameters on the left need to all say *Show All*, as Hyperion mentioned. Once you've done that, you should see rune pages pop right up!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
You need to filter the runes "Tier" = "Show all" and rune pages will show up.
